ovdesc.p: Customer and the safe deposit box details

desc.p: This field is used to specify the Company code in which the safe deposit box is located
This field is used to specify the Box size rented for the customer
This field is used to store the cabinet number under which the safe deposit box is located
This field denotes the Box number rented to the customer
This field gets updated with values OPEN and CLOSE based on the activity
If the box status is rented then the status in this table will be updated as Open and if the box status is closed then the status in this table will be updated as Closed
This field is updated based on the effective date of the apply payment activity
This field is updated based on the effective date of the close arrangement activity
This field updates the primary customer id of the safe deposit box
This field updates the other joint customers of safe deposit box
This field defines the role of Primary customer and Joint customers
This field denotes the name of the customer who visited the safe deposit box. This field gets updated based on customer visit activity
This field gets updated based on the customer visit of safe deposit box
This gets updated based on customer visit activity
This field denotes the visit time of safe deposit box by the primary or joint customers
desc.P: This field gets updated based on customer visit activity

desc.p: This field update the activity id of customer visit activity
